meanings.definition: (rare, anatomy) The central part of the head; the bregma.
meanings.english_definition: (rare, anatomy) The central part of the head; the bregma.

examples.sentence: The centriciput is located at the intersection of the coronal and sagittal sutures.
examples.translation: 正中頭頂は冠状縫合と矢状縫合の交点に位置する。

usage_notes.explanation: This term is rarely used in modern anatomical or medical contexts. The more common term is 'bregma'.

readability_explanation.text: This word is highly technical and rarely used. It is primarily of historical interest in anatomical terminology.
